data.name: Mandy
data.content: The package makes it difficult to discreetly and easily toss away the tampon. I usually put the discarded plastic back in the package, but the plasticky packaging is too tight. Also, the print on it rubs off. Not only am I already uncomfortable and disgruntled because I've been wrestling with the package and not I've got blue fingers after it too.

data.name: Vivian
data.content: As someone with a light flow basis, I really enjoy these pads. They are my go to for when my period is relatively light, where perhaps a regular, full pad isn't needed, but it is too frequent for a liner, that's when Always Ultra Thin Slender saves the day! It's light and simple but still durable for a light flow day. I use these quite often, they are thin comfortable and a pleasing pink color. They are noticeably smaller than Always Ultra Thin Regular but are as marketed, which is why I think they work well for light flow days. Would recommend to my friends. Thank you.

data.name: Allina
data.content: These pads are great when you can find the one you need...especially the number 3 pad, the hardest to find. Other than that the are available everywhere.
